      • write

        public void write(JSONSerializer serializer,
                  Object object,
                  Object fieldName,
                  Type fieldType,
                  int features)
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: ObjectSerializer
        fastjson invokes this call-back method during serialization when it encounters a field of the specified type.
        指定者:
        write 在接口中 ObjectSerializer
        object - src the object that needs to be converted to Json.
        fieldName - parent object field name
        fieldType - parent object field type
        features - parent object field serializer features
        抛出:
        IOException

      • deserialze

        public <T> T deserialze(DefaultJSONParser parser,
                        Type type,
                        Object fieldName)
        从接口复制的说明: ObjectDeserializer
        fastjson invokes this call-back method during deserialization when it encounters a field of the specified type.

        In the implementation of this call-back method, you should consider invoking JSON.parseObject(String, Type, Feature[]) method to create objects for any non-trivial field of the returned object.

        指定者:
        deserialze 在接口中 ObjectDeserializer
        参数:
        parser - context DefaultJSONParser being deserialized
        type - The type of the Object to deserialize to
        fieldName - parent object field name
        返回:
        a deserialized object of the specified type which is a subclass of T
